tool_description: With this API you will get the Flesch Kincaid Grade Level, Gunning Fog Score, SMOG Index, Word count, and much more!
name: Analyze Text
title: Analyze Text

api_list.name: analyze
api_list.description: With this API you will get the Flesch Kincaid Grade Level, Gunning Fog Score, SMOG Index, Word count, and much more!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://analyze-text1.p.rapidapi.com/analyze/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "analyze-text1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://analyze-text1.p.rapidapi.com/analyze/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "analyze-text1.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
